code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import AuthContext from'../AuthContext';import{CoreContext}from'./Core';var LogoSmall=require('../assets/Payroll-Pal-Logo Small.svg');function Header(){var coreContext=useContext(CoreContext);var authContext=useContext(AuthContext);var logout=function logout(){authContext.logout();};var updatePay=function updatePay(event){coreContext.setPayRate(event.target.value);};var approveAll=function approveAll(){coreContext.approveAll();coreContext.setMessage("All hours have been approved!");};return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("nav",{className:"navbar fixed-top navbar-expand-lg navbar-light bg-light"},React.createElement("a",{className:"ml-3 navbar-brand",href:"/core"},React.createElement("img",{alt:"Payroll Pal",src:LogoSmall})),React.createElement("button",{className:"navbar-toggler",type:"button","data-toggle":"collapse","data-target":"#navbarSupportedContent","aria-controls":"navbarSupportedContent","aria-expanded":"false","aria-label":"Toggle navigation"},React.createElement("span",{className:"navbar-toggler-icon"})),React.createElement("div",{className:"collapse justify-content-end navbar-collapse",id:"navbarSupportedContent"},React.createElement("ul",{className:"navbar-nav"},React.createElement("li",{className:"px-2 nav-item"},React.createElement("div",{onClick:approveAll,className:"pt-mono nav-link"},"Approve All")),React.createElement("li",{className:"px-2 nav-item"},React.createElement("div",{className:"pt-mono pay-rate-container nav-link"},"Pay Rate: $",React.createElement("input",{className:"pay-rate-input",onChange:updatePay,defaultValue:coreContext.payRate,type:"number"}))),React.createElement("li",{className:"px-2 nav-item"},React.createElement(Link,{to:"/login",className:"pt-mono nav-link",onClick:logout},"Logout"))))));}export default Header;
